title: /L
clause_text: /L.S./Engineershall apply for certificate of plinth checking in prescribed application for Moderate Risk building proposal only. The inspection shall be done by the concern Junior Engineers. The inspection report shall be prepared and uploaded within 48 hours. The Plinth checking certificate shall be grant within the period of 7 days from the receipt of the application, if found as per the sanctioned plan.
